thread.title: BRIEF-Perry Ellis International Announces Eyewear License Agreement For Farah Brand

title: BRIEF-Perry Ellis International Announces Eyewear License Agreement For Farah Brand

organizations.name: brief-perry ellis international announces eyewear license agreement for farah brand

text: February 27, 2018 / 2:09 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Perry Ellis International Announces Eyewear License Agreement For Farah Brand Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Perry Ellis International Inc: * PERRY ELLIS INTERNATIONAL ANNOUNCES EYEWEAR LICENSE AGREEMENT FOR FARAH BRAND * PERRY ELLIS INTERNATIONAL INC - ‍ ENTERED LICENSE AGREEMENT WITH INSPECS GROUP FOR MEN‘S OPHTHALMIC GLASSES AND SUNGLASSES UNDER FARAH BRAND​ * PERRY ELLIS INTERNATIONAL INC - ‍FARAH EYEWEAR PRODUCT WILL BE IN STORES FROM Q4 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
